summary: A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.
cast: Jorge Rivero|Andrea Occhipinti|Conrado San Martín|Violeta Cela|José Gras|Gioia Scola|Sabrina Siani
keywords: sword and sorcery|breasts|bound to x shaped cross|face paint|female nudity
title: La conquista de la tierra perdida (Conquest)
